name: Shelltered
description:
Explore a twisted world while Swapping between either of these two birds,
using the environment and differences of these two birds as your arsenal to
overcome obstacles or to discover secrets only obtainable due to their differences.

Take on brief minigames and view the world outside of your shelter.

The game requires immense precision, adaptive skill, planning ahead and at times patience.
Sometimes the game acts like a Puzzle, and if you are not properly prepared
you may lose your ability to progress, in some specific areas only.


I hope you are comfortable enough, so that you may derive enjoyment from it!
